Transit Widget Emulator 1.2.2 build 20101210

December 10, 2010

This is a defect release fixing some API issues for WAC 1.0 and JIL 1.2.2 specs. No new features or profile database changes have been made. See the project page for more details on the defects and resolutions.

Fixes

  • Issue 6: WAC 1.0 Message.addAddress call
  • Issue 7: Widget.Device.getAvailableApplications()
  • Issue 9: setPreferenceForKey throws an exception when parameter is valid
  • Issue 10: Widget.Multimedia.AudioPlayer.open() doesn't throw an exception
  • Issue 11: Widget.Multimedia.AudioPlayer.play() doesn't throw an exception
  • Issue 12: Widget.PIM.getAddressBookItem() doesn't throw an INVALID_PARAMETER exception
